title: wine_Recanati_2014_Reserve_Marselan_(Galilee)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 121442.
country: Israel.
description: Inky garnet to the eye, this wine features aromas of cherry and strawberry with a strong dose of violet. Although it has strong flavors of lightly cooked woodland fruits (including notes of vanilla, brambles and soft citrus) it is bright and retains a grip on the palate from start to finish. Lasting tannins are ever present yet not overpowering. The finish is characterized by flavors of tangerine and baking spices..
designation: Reserve.
points: 90.
price: 50.0.
province: Galilee.
region_1: .
region_2: .
taster_name: Mike DeSimone.
taster_twitter_handle: @worldwineguys.
title: Recanati 2014 Reserve Marselan (Galilee).
variety: Marselan.
